mcq.statement: How far north did Muhammad Bin Qasim extend his control in the Indus Valley after arriving in the Sub-continent?
mcq.one_liner: After arriving in the Sub-continent, **Muhammad Bin Qasim** extended his control in the Indus Valley as far north as **Multan**.

suggestions.topic: Arrival of Muhammad bin Qasim to Subcontinent (712)
